grids.professional: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 (Bento Grid Mode A)
grids.dj: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-6 gap-4 (Asymmetrical / Broken Grid)

header.toggle_switch: Must be prominent. Smooth transition between 'Tech' and 'Rave' icons.

buttons.professional: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-black text-white hover:bg-neutral-800 transition-all duration-300 font-medium
buttons.dj: rounded-none px-8 py-3 border border-fuchsia-500 text-fuchsia-500 hover:bg-fuchsia-500 hover:text-black transition-all duration-200 font-bold uppercase tracking-widest shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(217,70,239,0.3)]

cards.professional: bg-neutral-50 border border-neutral-200 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:border-neutral-300 transition-colors
cards.dj: bg-neutral-900/50 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-colors rounded-none

motion_guidelines.professional_animations: Fade in up, staggered list reveals, smooth scaling.
motion_guidelines.dj_animations: Glitch effects on text hover, fast cuts, marquee scrolling, neon pulse.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance in both modes. Use lighter greys for text in DJ mode, not dark grey.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings: Blue for Pro, Fuchsia for DJ.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
2. Update index.html to include the Google Fonts specified in typography section.
3. Create a 'ThemeContext' to manage the 'professional' vs 'dj' state and persist to localStorage.
4. Use the 'mode' state to conditionally render the entire layout wrapper (fonts, colors, spacing).
5. Implement the 'ToggleSwitch' component first, as it drives the entire UI.
6. For the 'Gig Timeline', use a JSON data structure that can be easily filtered.
7. Ensure the 'Contact' section adapts: Simple form for Pro, Booking Agent details for DJ.
8. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and section headers.
9. DO NOT use generic gradients. Use the specific colors defined in the palette.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds in Pro mode.
Never use pure white (#ffffff) for text in DJ mode (use #ededed).
